sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="localVisible" max-width="600px">
    <v-form ref="form">
      <v-text-field v-model="localStudent.name" label="Name" required></v-text-field>
      <v-text-field v-model="localStudent.grade1" label="Grade 1" type="number" min="0" max="10" required></v-text-field>
      <v-text-field v-model="localStudent.grade2" label="Grade 2" type="number" min="0" max="10" required></v-text-field>
      <v-text-field v-model="localStudent.grade3" label="Grade 3" type="number" min="0" max="10" required></v-text-field>
      <v-text-field v-model="localStudent.grade4" label="Grade 4" type="number" min="0" max="10" required></v-text-field>
      <v-btn text @click="close">Cancel</v-btn>
      <v-btn color="primary" @click="save">Save</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    student: Object,
    visible: Boolean
  },
  data() {
    return {
      localStudent: { ...this.student }, // Cria uma cópia local dos dados do estudante
      localVisible: this.visible // Usa uma variável local para controlar a visibilidade
    };
  },
  watch: {
    visible(newValue) {
      this.localVisible = newValue; // Sincroniza a visibilidade local com a prop
    },
    student(newValue) {
      this.localStudent = { ...newValue }; // Sincroniza o estudante local com a prop
    }
  },
  methods: {
    close() {
      this.$emit('cancel');
    },
    save() {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        this.$emit('save', this.localStudent);
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
/* Adicione o estilo específico do componente aqui */
</style>
